system.description:
This type includes insects, arachnids, other arthropods, worms, and similar invertebrates.

Features: 8-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to Â¾ total Hit Dice (as cleric); good Fortitude saves. Most vermin are mindless and gain no skill points or feats.

Traits: Vermin breathe, eat, and sleep; proficient with natural weapons only; darkvision 60 ft.; mindless (no Intelligence score, immunity to mind-affecting effects).
